verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thank You for the privilege Of seeking Your face. Thank You for the confidence To enter this place, And to lift my hands And sing Your praise And worship You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, You are holy and righteous. Your Word is faithful and true. I’m overwhelmed by Your presence here And all I can do is ……{/lang-eng}
